name: Off Road Challenge 3D
description:
Get ready for an off-roading challenge like you’ve never experienced before!

Hop into the driver's seat and traverse through different terrains by crawling your way to victory over the rocks, across the suspended bridges and knocking down fence posts that stand in your way.

Make sure you don’t try to race to the finish line otherwise you might find yourself upside down or out of fuel with one wrong move.

Are you ready to become the ultimate off road champion?

Off Road Challenge 3D features:
Realism at your fingertips with this unique artstyle
Make your way across treacherous terrain
Watch your fuel consumption
Complete the challenges
Become an off road champion
